snippet: Scholten & Baijings are shaking up the world of Dutch design with candy colors and, even more shocking, a belief in mass production.
abstract: Scholten & Baijings, design firm run by husband-and-wife team Stefan Scholten and Carole Baijings, are making splash in muted Dutch design world with their brightly colored home accessories and textiles; look at intriguing and quirky decor within their home and office described.
lead_paragraph: Scholten & Baijings are shaking up the world of Dutch design with candy colors and, even more shocking, a belief in mass production.
